amendment.description: To extend the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 3114 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3114 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 88.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3114.
Amendment SA 3114 proposed by Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S4812; text: CR S4812) To extend the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3114 proposed by Senator Cantwell.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3114 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 88.
